analysis.description:
Crowdsale.__beneficiaryTransfer (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(value) (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.refund (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#225-255):
	External calls:
	- tokens = __redeemAmount(investor) (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#238-241)
	- __redeemTokens(investor,tokens) (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#252-254)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#252-254)

Crowdsale.__issueTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#308-317) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(creator,investor,tokens * k) (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#315-317)

Crowdsale.__redeemTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#333-339) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(investor,creator,tokens * k) (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.refund (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#225-255):
	External calls:
	- tokens = __redeemAmount(investor) (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#238-241)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- refunded (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#248)
	- refunds (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#251)
	- tokensRedeemed (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#248-251)
Crowdsale.transactions should be constant (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#106-107)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#9-10) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#10-11) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.transfer (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#11-12) should be declared external
ERC20.allowance (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#20-21) should be declared external
ERC20.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#21-22) should be declared external
ERC20.approve (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#22-23) should be declared external
Crowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol#280-291) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/20/0x78b78cfb7f90edab1ddb0bb3be75cb228bb15d0c.sol:
